headline: Nova Minerals' $6.73 Million Snow Lake Sale Fuels Debt Reduction And Alaskan Gold Ambitions: Details
summary: Nova Minerals Limited (NASDAQ:NVA) announced on Thursday that it has completed the sale of 6.6 million shares in Snow Lake Resources Ltd, realizing gross proceeds of $6.73 million. This divestment is part of the company’s strategy to optimize its asset portfolio and unlock shareholder value by advancing its gold and antimony assets within the Estelle Gold and Critical Minerals Project in Alaska. headline: Snow Lake Secures Funding to Drive Exploration, Strategic Acquisitions, and Investments in Clean Energy and Next Gen Minerals
summary: Winnipeg, Manitoba--(Newsfile Corp. - December 31, 2024) - Snow Lake Resources Ltd., d/b/a Snow Lake Energy (NASDAQ: LITM) ("Snow Lake"), announces that following two successful financings raising in excess of $20M USD (before costs) it is sufficiently funded to both aggressively explore its global portfolio of projects and to make further high impact value accretive acquisitions and investments in the next generation and clean energy minerals space.Exploration Program HighlightsOur immediate ex

headline: Snow Lake Announces Closing of Public Offering for Gross Proceeds of US$15 Million
